alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 7:18PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jefferson and northwestern Oswego Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 718 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oswego, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oswego, Sandy Island Beach State Park, Pulaski, Selkirk Shores State Park, Nine Mile Point, Southwick Beach State Park, Mexico Point State Park, Scriba, Richland, New Haven, Minetto, Sandy Creek, Lacona, Mannsville, Ellisburg, Montario Point, Smartville, Belleville, Furniss and Fruit Valley. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 36 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
